description: Data was loaded from TCGA hg38 data and TCGA Biospecimen Data on March 2018. Ranked Hg38 gene expression data was ranked by coefficient of variation taking a subset with high variance and filtering out long RNA sequences then generating a random sample of biospecimen excluding barcodes that don't end in '-A01' was loaded using BigQuery. More details: https://isb-cancer-genomics-cloud.readthedocs.io/en/latest/sections/QueryOfTheMonthClub.html#march-2018
friendlyName: MAR2018 QUERY OF THE MONTH TABLE 1

fields.description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; eg TCGA-OV, etc.
fields.name: project_short_name

fields.description: Whether the gene is from TCGA-PAAD
fields.name: Phenotype

fields.description: The gene symbol. In this table, gene symbol is gene name e.g. ACADVL
fields.name: Gene

fields.description: Fragments Per Kilobase of transcript per Million mapped reads (FPKM) is a simple expression level normalization method. The FPKM normalizes read count based on gene length and the total number of mapped reads. https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Encyclopedia/pages/HTSeq-FPKM/
fields.name: Expr
